Description:
Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation with a parameter substring

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Daniel Bohannon (idea), Roberto Rodriguez (Fix)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious PowerShell Parameter Substring
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (process_path="*\\powershell.exe" OR process_path="*\\pwsh.exe") (command="* -windowstyle h *" OR command="* -windowstyl h*" OR command="* -windowsty h*" OR command="* -windowst h*" OR command="* -windows h*" OR command="* -windo h*" OR command="* -wind h*" OR command="* -win h*" OR command="* -wi h*" OR command="* -win h *" OR command="* -win hi *" OR command="* -win hid *" OR command="* -win hidd *" OR command="* -win hidde *" OR command="* -NoPr *" OR command="* -NoPro *" OR command="* -NoProf *" OR command="* -NoProfi *" OR command="* -NoProfil *" OR command="* -nonin *" OR command="* -nonint *" OR command="* -noninte *" OR command="* -noninter *" OR command="* -nonintera *" OR command="* -noninterac *" OR command="* -noninteract *" OR command="* -noninteracti *" OR command="* -noninteractiv *" OR command="* -ec *" OR command="* -encodedComman *" OR command="* -encodedComma *" OR command="* -encodedComm *" OR command="* -encodedCom *" OR command="* -encodedCo *" OR command="* -encodedC *" OR command="* -encoded *" OR command="* -encode *" OR command="* -encod *" OR command="* -enco *" OR command="* -en *" OR command="* -executionpolic *" OR command="* -executionpoli *" OR command="* -executionpol *" OR command="* -executionpo *" OR command="* -executionp *" OR command="* -execution bypass*" OR command="* -executio bypass*" OR command="* -executi bypass*" OR command="* -execut bypass*" OR command="* -execu bypass*" OR command="* -exec bypass*" OR command="* -exe bypass*" OR command="* -ex bypass*" OR command="* -ep bypass*" OR command="* /windowstyle h *" OR command="* /windowstyl h*" OR command="* /windowsty h*" OR command="* /windowst h*" OR command="* /windows h*" OR command="* /windo h*" OR command="* /wind h*" OR command="* /win h*" OR command="* /wi h*" OR command="* /win h *" OR command="* /win hi *" OR command="* /win hid *" OR command="* /win hidd *" OR command="* /win hidde *" OR command="* /NoPr *" OR command="* /NoPro *" OR command="* /NoProf *" OR command="* /NoProfi *" OR command="* /NoProfil *" OR command="* /nonin *" OR command="* /nonint *" OR command="* /noninte *" OR command="* /noninter *" OR command="* /nonintera *" OR command="* /noninterac *" OR command="* /noninteract *" OR command="* /noninteracti *" OR command="* /noninteractiv *" OR command="* /ec *" OR command="* /encodedComman *" OR command="* /encodedComma *" OR command="* /encodedComm *" OR command="* /encodedCom *" OR command="* /encodedCo *" OR command="* /encodedC *" OR command="* /encoded *" OR command="* /encode *" OR command="* /encod *" OR command="* /enco *" OR command="* /en *" OR command="* /executionpolic *" OR command="* /executionpoli *" OR command="* /executionpol *" OR command="* /executionpo *" OR command="* /executionp *" OR command="* /execution bypass*" OR command="* /executio bypass*" OR command="* /executi bypass*" OR command="* /execut bypass*" OR command="* /execu bypass*" OR command="* /exec bypass*" OR command="* /exe bypass*" OR command="* /ex bypass*" OR command="* /ep bypass*")
